name: Black Rose
description: Equipped with a flashlight, investigate an abandoned funeral home that's said to be haunted. Find out what really happened to the people who once worked there, and hope that this dark, eerie building doesn't become your final resting place.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, Windows Vista Processor: 2.0 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GT 630M or equivalent DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 337 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Not bad for free. No crashes or performance issues, doors even worked! D:         YouTube™ Video:  Black Rose: Gameplay (PC HD) (Free to Play Horror Game)
FOR A FREE GAME, THIS IS DEFINITELY A GOOD ONE!!!!!
Definitely worth a try.

Black Rose is a free 3D first person exploration game. It worked, looked ok, played ok, sounded ok. Dark creepy haunted house environment, all you have is a Flashlight. Horror mystery story. Has instruction page. Does not have exit button, have to alt tab out and close the game window from outside. Try it and delete it. For more info:         YouTube™ Video:  Black Rose Let's Play Gameplay - FRIGHTENING FTP HORROR GAME! | Indie Horror Games 2016

Not too bad. The game play is smooth, and the graphics are atmospheric enough. The only negative thing is that the scare factor just wasn't as high as I anticipated. At least for me. It is a pretty solid story in my opinion though, and it is worth checking out, especially since it is free. And you can tell that the developers did put some work into this one. Good game so far. You should give it a try if you haven't already!

Dear Sir bedlam. If you're reading this review i first would like to say congratulations on getting Black Rose on Steam. I'm glad it got green lighted. This is an amazing horror game, I haven't played a game this scary since Amnesia. The story is awesome, Sullivan and Myrtle are two Fricking scary antagonists, and the events of the game got me fully immeresed right up to the end which made me happy. The only thing i truly dislike is the fact that i beat the game in less than a day. Not to sound spiteful or anything, it's just i enjoyed it so much that i wish it was longer like Amnesia. Other than that it's amazing that this is free to play, is very scary, and runs amazing on my computer. I give Black rose a 9.5/10 and recommend it for those looking for a great horror game.

Graphically this game isn't that amazing but it makes up for it in many other ways. The atmosphere and the music really sets the tone and draws you in. It adequetely creates a spooky and creepy environment to make the jumpscares effective without them being over the top or too numerous.   First horror game I've played since Among the Sleep, very much enjoyed Black Rose.

It gave my absolutely no chance, was not scary, and overall took the fun from the whole game. I would appreciate it if it was maybe a bit more like Slender in the aspect that the girl were to sneek behind you at times, or appear in coners of a dark room rather than the game stopping and forcing you to look at her.
